alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 5:11AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN IBERIA...NORTHWESTERN ST. MARY AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 545 AM CST... At 511 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charenton, or 9 miles east of Jeanerette, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Jeanerette, Stephensville, Baldwin, Sorrel, Cote Blanche Island, Glencoe, Lydia, Lake Fausse Pointe, Charenton, and Weeks Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary
